reference_summary:
Skymore 30ml Fast Hair Growth Serum, Anti-Hair Loss, Hair Thinning Treatment, 100% Pure & Natural, Non-Greasy, Nourishing & Moisturizing, All Hair Types
Skymore
{'Brand': 'Skymore', 'Item Form': 'serum', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 3.94 inches; 3.07 Ounces'}
I waited to write review so this product had time to work or not. It arrived 1July. I used that day & have used everyday as of 28July. There are actual tiny strands of hair growing from my scalp where there hasn't been in 4yrs due to medication needed from a horrific accident. Do exactly as instructions indicate. Product arrived well packaged. As a woman lost hair is devastating. To try products with no results will have most women severely depressed. This product made me smile, laugh, cry, and sob all in that order. It was so much to take in when I saw lil sprout's of my hair growing from my scalp, just amazing.. Definitely worth trying. Only 4 stars because I'm not sure how long I'll have to use or if I stop using will my hair stop growing. Other than that reason I would have given 5 star.. Would recommend.
I have tiny strands of hair where there hasnt been any in 4years
Gejoy 12 Pieces Shiny Scrunchie Elastics Scrunchy Bobbles Metallic Hair Scrunchies for Dance Show Party Gym Club of Women and Girls
{'Item Weight': '0.11 Pounds', 'Number of Pieces': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 4.57 x 0.94 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '797153595056'}
These arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Loved opening these scrunchies. Vibrant colors.... super stretchy.... super strong.... enjoy wearing these. Just pull up my hair and in the scrunchie and I’m off on my way.
Arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Vibrant colors. Super stretchy. Very strong.
FAMILIFE Soap Sheets 12 Packs Portable Soap Paper Disposable Hand Wash Paper Soap Mini Slice Scents Travel Outdoor Use
FAMILIFE
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'FAMILIFE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 1.97 x 0.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '799443862763'}
I used with water and at best there was only a couple of bubbles. Thought for the price I’d try these. Normally purchasing a more expensive brand I now have found is worth the extra $$ after purchasing and using these. Great smell. Easy to use. Arrived well packaged. I used 5 sheets and each and every single time these didn’t bubble up like others. My hands didn’t feel clean after use. Threw the remaining sheets in the garbage.
Hands definitely did NOT feel clean after using these paper soaps. DON’T recommend purchasing.
Jibitee Replacement Brush Heads Compatible with Philips Sonicare E-Series HX7022/66, fit Screw-On Electric Toothbrush Handles, 6 Pack
Jibitee
{'Brand': 'Jibitee', 'Size': '6 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Bristle Material': 'Nylon', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 4.33 x 1.65 inches; 7.37 Ounces', 'UPC': '740030415367'}
Arrived very well packaged. I put this right on my Sonic toothbrush.  Easy Peezy.. I have used everyday since received. No issues whatsoever. I highly recommend purchasing this product. I’m a happy customer!
Used with my sonic toothbrush with no issues whatsoever. Great deal.
Magical Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, Advanced Molecular Hair Roots Treatment, Professtional Hair Conditioner, Deep Conditioner Suitable for Dry & Damaged Hair, Restore Soft Hair Fast
ELAIMEI
{'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 2.36 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '882235209775'}
I have found this Hair Treatment DOES in fact work. Easy to use. Leaves my kinky hair softer, and actually smooth. No overpowering scent. No scent at all. My hair doesn’t feel heavy or that wet/oily residue others have left on my hair. Pleased with this Hair Treatment.
Doesn’t leave my hair feeling heavy or oily looking. Leaves my hair softer.
Toydoooco Tongue Scraper Stainless Steel - Tongue Cleaner Food Grade Steel Rust Protection Metal Dental Scraper with Handy Carrying Store Case for Fresh Breath
ICOBES
{'Product Dimensions': '6.85 x 2.36 x 0.7 inches; 3.84 Ounces'}
Husband drinks coffee all day. These Tongue Scrappers take all that yucky residue off his tongue perfectly. Most definitely helps with with bad breath. He thanked me and said boy these really scrape everything off my tongue. He & I both can tell a difference in him using these.
Works exactly as described.
Magical Hair Treatment Mask,5 Seconds to Restore Soft Hair, Advanced Molecular Hair Roots Treatment Professtional Hair Conditioner, Deep Conditioner Suitable for Dry & Damaged Hair (1 PACK)
ALW Beauty
{'Brand': 'ALW Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating, Conditioning, Moisturizing, Nourishing, Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '2.05 x 2.05 x 1.85 inches; 3.53 Ounces'}
Ok so I have colored hair. I’ve had highlights as well. My hair was visually damaged. Using this Magical Hair Treatment Mask, has softened my hair. Given my hair a bounce. Only use a lil bit to get outstanding results! I make sure my hair is washed clean with no conditioner used. I then use a lil bit of this product and that’s it. The irony is I told husband after my 1use this stuff is like magic, look at the difference in my hair now. He laughed and said “ Sweetheart that just may be the reason it’s called Magical Hair Treatment Mask”. I laughed so hard. There you have it. It’s called Magical Hair Treatment Mask, because it’s like magic.
Easy to use. Works fast. Great results are noticeable after using. Does exactly as it claims.

profile:
**Updated User Summary:**

- **Health and Wellness Focus**: The user remains dedicated to enhancing both hair health and oral hygiene, integrating quality products that boost self-esteem into their broader well-being routine.

- **Positive Experiences with New Products**: Having recently showcased enthusiasm for a hair treatment that significantly improved their hair's texture, the user is now expanding their interests into nail care. Their latest purchase highlights a growing willingness to explore effective solutions that align with their quality standards.

- **Skepticism and Expectations**: The user maintains a cautious approach, placing a high priority on evidence-backed results in their product choices. Their discerning nature ensures they select only high-performing items, reflecting a strong emphasis on functionality and effectiveness.

- **Product Experience**: They value clear instructions and thoughtful packaging. Recent experiences with various products, including one for nail care, underscore their high regard for functionality, leading to increased satisfaction and higher ratings.

- **Balanced Evaluation**: Historically rating products around 4 stars, the user is trending towards higher ratings as they encounter effective solutions, indicating an increasingly positive outlook on product performance.

- **Broader Interests**: Their interests are now extended to include nail care alongside hair and oral hygiene, maintaining a strong emphasis on quality and effectiveness in all their health and wellness products.

In summary, the user prioritizes high-quality, effective health and wellness products, appreciates positive experiences, and continuously evaluates their choices based on satisfaction and performance across various personal care domains.
